TextEng: Give me the baby and I promise you a quick, painless death.
Text: 아기를 내놔, 그럼 빠르고 고통 없는 죽음을 약속하지.

TextEng: If you kill the child, I will have to kill you.
Just give me the baby and I will let you go.
The babe looks upset, I will play a song to calm it.
Text: 아기가 불안해 보이네, 진정시킬 노래를 불러줄게.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Fascinate kobold then steal the baby.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Cast Charm Spell]</Start> You will give the baby to me.
Text: <StartAction>[매혹 주문을 시전한다.]</Start> 넌 아기를 나한테 줄 거야.

TextEng: You will leave peacefully.
<StartAction>[Persuade]</Start> Give me the baby or die, now!
I would rather just kill you and take the baby.
Text: 그냥 널 죽이고 아기를 빼앗는 게 낫겠어.

TextEng: Ok... here you...<StartAction>[Snatch the baby from the kobold]</Start>
I will kill you first.
Just give me the baby!
Oops, sorry bout that, I slipped..
I'll go get one.
Here's a nice shiny gem. Now give me that child!
Text: 여기 멋진 보석이야. 이제 아이 내놔!

TextEng: Kill it now, while we have it cornered!
I have a better idea. <StartAction>[Snatch the baby from the kobold.]</Start>
Text: 더 좋은 생각이 있어. <StartAction>[코볼트에게서 아기를 낚아챈다.]</Start>

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade - Lie]</Start> No, I don't have any gems.
Fine. Take the gem, but give us the child.
Text: 좋아. 보석 가져가, 하지만 아이는 내놔.

TextEng: Yes, I have one, but I don't trust the kobold.
Text: 응, 있어, 하지만 코볼트를 믿을 수 없어.

TextEng: Yes, I have one. Here, take it and give the child back.
Text: 응, 있어. 여기, 가져가고 아이 돌려줘.
